name: Purrfect Apawcalypse! Incredible Furture!
storyline:
Volt is a student at Hachiko High School. One day, he organizes a test of courage tournament at the "House of No Return" in the depths of Kemono Woods! The participants are a young lady Papillon, an earnest Akita dog, and... Samoyed who yearns to be a cat?!
Will they be able to successfully complete the test of courage? And what secrets lurk in the House of No Return?
summary: This is the PA series first Fan-game!
